articles.author: Alexander Tin
articles.title: CDC plans "emergency meeting" on rare heart inflammation following COVID-19 vaccines - CBS News
articles.description: Reported cases represent just a tiny fraction of the nearly 130 million Americans who have been fully vaccinated with either Pfizer or Moderna's doses.
articles.content: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced Thursday that it will convene an "emergency meeting" of its advisers on June 18th to discuss rare but higher-than-expected reports of heart in… [+3306 chars]

articles.author: Claudia Rebaza, Abel Alvarado and Jimena de la Quintana, CNN
articles.title: Peru's presidential election is just too close to call - CNN
articles.description: Peru's presidential election is going to the wire with authorities in the Latin American country yet to declare a winner in a tightly contested battle between a  political newcomer and his conservative opponent.

articles.author: Mark Landler
articles.title: America May Be ‘Back’ in Europe, but How Much Has Really Changed? - The New York Times
articles.description: Despite the feel-good imagery expected to be on display at the Group of 7 meeting, many Europeans suspect that President Biden is little more interested in give-and-take than was his predecessor.
articles.content: Far from the reset button that Mr. Biden famously announced in 2009 while serving as Mr. Obamas vice president, his meeting with Mr. Putin seems designed mostly to keep a lid on tensions with a habit… [+1417 chars]

articles.author: Rachel Gilmore
articles.title: Border battles: Vaccines ‘being thrown out’ in U.S. should go to Canadians, mayors say - Global News
articles.description: Americans are 'throwing vaccines out every day because they expire ... and we've got arms here that would be willing hosts for these vaccines,' said the Niagara Falls mayor.
articles.content: Perfectly good U.S.-owned COVID-19 vaccine doses are regularly going into garbage bins just kilometers away from the Canadian border, according to local mayors and health care providers who are now f… [+8173 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Dortmund reject Man Utd's £67m opening bid for Sancho - Goal.com
articles.description: Sevilla winger Lucas Ocampos has been left out of Argentina's Copa America squad, which was finalised on Thursday night, according to the official CONMEBOL website.
